title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Boil the spaghetti. Fry the pancetta. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine all with pasta.

title: Chicken Alfredo
instructions: Cook the pasta. Cook the chicken. Make the sauce. Combine all with pasta.

title: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook the beef. Prepare the toppings. Assemble the tacos.

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter the bread. Place cheese between slices. Grill until golden brown.
